author: dkhaywood
msg: Extended ParseableFacet to include an editableTitleOf(NakedObject), and renamed titleOf(NakedObject) to displaytitleOf(NakedObject).  Also made NakedObjectSpecification search up its hierarchy for non-noop facets if cannot find any of type.  In addition, JavaIntrospector no longer requires the classes or interfaces that it introspects to be public (was causing issues trying to demonstrate use of 3rd party library as a value type, and doesn't seem to break anything...)

author: dkhaywood
msg: Defaulted, Encodeable, Parseable and Value annotations will all pick up their respective provider/encoderDecoder/parser/semanticsProvider from the configuration file if not specified;  moreover the annotation doesn't even need to be specified, can be driven entirely from the config file (this to support 3rd party value types, for example);  also simplified ClassStrategy cos most of the methods now redundant.
